title: Textile With Cloth Marks, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: printed on plain weave
markings: Side A. An oval containing three fleur d lys and a crown over the letters 'FON' in brown stamped at each end, 'F 5785' in brown stamed at one end and in the middle, 'F.8517. ' stamped in blue alone one edge, ' 14733' stamped in black, 'f.8094' and '238' stamped in red. No marks on the other side.
dimensions: Warp: 199 cm (78 1/4 in. ). Weft; (selvage on left), 90 cm (35 3/8 in. ).
description: Length of unbleached linen with merchants marks stamped on it. The marks indicate agents and/or merchants.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile With Cloth Marks, 1750–1800.Medium: linen
Technique: printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-289.
